startup.author: Sachin and Binny Bansal
startup.thought: The core of any business is to earn money. You have not done your job well until you find a stranger who is willing to open his/her wallet to give you money for the service/products that you are offering.

startup.author: Bhavish Aggarwal
startup.thought: Go out and start up. It is the hardest thing to do. For me it was very hard. When I started, my parents thought I was going to become a travel agent. It was very hard to convince them that I was not.

startup.author: Kunal Bahl
startup.thought: Scale is important for a startup. Think big, but take one day at a time.

startup.author: Vijay Shekhar Sharma
startup.thought: Be so sharp that you cut

startup.author: Naveen Tewari
startup.thought: Entrepreneurship is all about how confident you are in changing something, because most of the people will not accept that change so go ahead and learn it.

startup.author: Ritesh Agarwal
startup.thought: It is extremely important to build something that a 100 people absolutely love using rather than make something that a 1000 people would just, kind of, like.

startup.author: Shashank ND
startup.thought: The goal has never been about being an entrepreneur or starting a company. It has always been about solving a problem we deeply care about.

startup.author: Deepinder Goyal
startup.thought: The fundamental model of our business is that in mature markets we should make profits and they shouldn’t need any more outside money to grow.

startup.author: Kunal Shah
startup.thought: If you fully accept the worst that can ever happen in your journey, fear won’t ever be an obstacle in starting-up.

startup.author: Rahul Yadav
startup.thought: Life’s purpose is to be happy! So if you are happy, you are successful in life

anonymous.author: Anonymous
anonymous.thought: Work till you get what you want

anonymous.author: Anonymous
anonymous.thought: Don't let the choice that you didn't make weigh you down.

anonymous.author: Anonymous
anonymous.thought: I don't plan on being famous, but I do plan on living the dream.

anonymous.author: Anonymous
anonymous.thought: Don't give up because things are hard, but work harder, when you think of giving up.

anonymous.author: Anonymous
anonymous.thought: Be with people who know your VALUE, not your PRICE.

anonymous.author: Anonymous
anonymous.thought: Sometimes the best discoveries are the result of simple observations

anonymous.author: Anonymous
anonymous.thought: Be the Motivation, not the Distraction

anonymous.author: Anonymous
anonymous.thought: If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in the future. If you are at peace, you are living in the present.

motivation.author: Muhammad Ali
motivation.thought: I know where I'm going and I know the truth, and I don't have to be what you want me to be. I'm free to be what I want.

motivation.author: St. Jerome
motivation.thought: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.

motivation.author: Chrisne Garnier
motivation.thought: Never let the fear of the fall discourage you from the climb. There's beauty up there and it's worth the risk.

motivation.author: Bobby Roghubir
motivation.thought: Be strong in all your undertakings, and adapt to your surroundings.

motivation.author: Samantha Storsberg
motivation.thought: The classroom within is where the true learning takes place.

motivation.author: Anuj Somany
motivation.thought: Success is not a journey; it's a destination called satisfaction.

motivation.author: Ravi Varma
motivation.thought: There Is No Failure. It's Only Un-Finished Success.

motivation.author: Jordan Ricks
motivation.thought: Luck is the chaperone of those who are unsure of what they want. Success is reserved for those who know.

motivation.author: Jerry Rice
motivation.thought: Today I will do what others won't, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can't.
